definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The Red Sea was divided and congealed or was frozen in place until God released the Sea again.
sentences.chinese: 红海的海水便分开并且凝固住直到上帝让海水复合。

sentences.english: 13 to him who divided the Red Sea asunder His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 称谢那分裂红海的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 称谢那分裂红海的，因他的慈爱永远长存。

sentences.english: In recent years people had taken to calling this coast the Red Sea Riviera.
sentences.chinese: 最近几年，人们开始将这片海岸称作红海的蔚蓝海岸。

sentences.english: The Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba extend from the Red Sea toward the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: 在苏伊士湾和亚喀巴湾延伸从红海向地中海。

sentences.english: Thou didst walk through the sea with thine horses, through the heap of great waters.
sentences.chinese: 你乘马践踏红海，就是践踏汹涌的大水。

sentences.english: The Red Sea divides Asia from Africa.
sentences.chinese: 红海把亚洲和非洲分开。

sentences.english: And they journeyed from mount Hor by the way of the Red sea, to compass the land of Edom: and the soul of the people was much discouraged because of the way.
sentences.chinese: 他们从何珥山起行，往红海那条路走，要绕过以东地。

sentences.english: He says the science of fluids in motion can explain the parting of the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 他指出流体运动学可以解释红海的分离。

sentences.english: Mating is as hard as the cleaving of the waters of the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 找对象之难，有如将红海之水劈开一般。

sentences.english: The Jieshi bay and Honghai Bay.
Cain wandered until he found Lilith by the Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 该隐一直流亡着，直到他在红海找到了莉莉丝。

sentences.english: If you drop a white hat into the Red Sea . What will it be…
sentences.chinese: 如果把白帽子扔进红海里会发生什么事？

sentences.english: The cases were reported from Hudeida governorate in south-west Yemen, on the Red Sea coast.
sentences.chinese: 这些病例是也门西南部红海海岸的荷台达省报告的。

sentences.english: Soldier B: Tip of the Red Sea, Gulf of Aqaba.
sentences.chinese: 红海的要地，亚喀巴海湾。

sentences.english: They traveled from Mount Hor along the route to the Red Sea, to go around Edom.
sentences.chinese: 他们从何珥山起行，往红海那条路走，要绕过以东地。

definition: to go out to sea/(neologism) to expand into overseas markets
to make an amphibious assault/to seize a beachhead/to gain a foothold in (a new market)
Eilat, Israeli port and resort on the Red sea
rushing to stake one's claim in new markets
